The restart request was successfully sent, and the command has been queued with AWS. There are no further steps mentioned in the predefined directives that need to be addressed.\",\"Action\":{\"Action Reason\":\"The mission to restart the EC2 instance has been completed successfully, and all predefined directives have been addressed. According to the predefined directives, I need to use the EC2RemediationHelper tool with the instance_id parameter directly. I must request human approval before executing the restart.\",\"Action\":{\"Action Reason\":\"The EC2RemediationHelper tool is appropriate for restarting the EC2 instance as per the mission and predefined directives. I need to use the instance_id parameter directly.\",\"Name\":\"EC2RemediationHelper\"},\"Action Inputs\":{\"instance_id\":{\"Action Input Reason\":\"The instance_id 'i-008163ca9714cf100' is directly provided in the mission, and it is required to restart the EC2 instance.\",\"Value\":\"i-008163ca9714cf100\"}},\"URL\":\"/sys_gen_ai_log_metadata.do?sys_id=8d444f4f830032107f449141ccda1ea7\",\"Time\":\"6306\"}"}</output><parent display_value="Created 2025-09-22 15:00:16">3634cb4f830032107f449141ccda1ec4</parent><status>success</status><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-22 15:00:16</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>cf34cb4f830032107f449141ccda1ef0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-22 15:00:26</sys_updated_on><target_document_id>undefined</target_document_id><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><task_dependencies/><type>gen_ai</type></sn_aia_execution_task></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_execution_task_3634cb4f830032107f449141ccda1ec4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_execution_task"><sn_aia_execution_task action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>EC2 Remediation Assistant</description><execution_plan display_value="Created 2025-09-22 15:00:07">fc34874f830032107f449141ccda1ef9</execution_plan><metadata>{"agentDetails":{"name":"EC2 Remediation Assistant","role":"You are an EC2 remediation specialist for DevOps operations who specializes in getting failed instances to run again.","background":"You help DevOps engineers restart failed EC2 instances. You can:

1. Look up incidents by number and extract instance IDs from descriptions automatically
2. Extract instance IDs from incident descriptions (look for patterns like i-09ae69f1cb71f622e) 
3. Restart instances using the EC2 remediation tool (requires human approval)
4. Provide status updates and troubleshooting guidance

When someone says "Help me with incident INC0010019", use the incident_id parameter to look up the incident automatically.
When someone says "Restart instance i-12345", use the instance_id parameter directly.

Always request human approval before executing restarts. Be conversational but professional. Explain what you're doing and what the results mean.","sys_id":"99747852834032107f449141ccda1ea9","strategy":"f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74"},"task":"restart instance i-008163ca9714cf100","strategyTopic":"AIA-ReAct"}</metadata><order>200</order><output>{"result":"The EC2 instance with ID i-008163ca9714cf100 has been successfully restarted, and the command has been queued with AWS."}</output><parent/><status>success</status><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-22 15:00:16</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>3634cb4f830032107f449141ccda1ec4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-22 15:00:43</sys_updated_on><target_document_id>99747852834032107f449141ccda1ea9</target_document_id><target_document_table>sn_aia_agent</target_document_table><task_dependencies/><type>agent</type></sn_aia_execution_task></record_update>
